timeline.message: Added a call  in SdlArtwork default constructor to call Super empty constructor to set overwrite property
Added logic to check overwrite property for uploadFile in baseFileManager
Added overWrite property check in baseFileManager uploadFiles
added overwrite property to SdlFile in javaSE
Since overwrite is set to true by default, I removed it form constructors and added it to the top of the classes

timeline.bodyText: In java suite, this not necessary since we are covering that case in hasUploadedFile(). So that if statement can be removed. This also applies to uploadFiles()
